query:
SELECT 
  'Biographies' as dataType, COUNT(*) as count FROM teacher_biographies
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Integration Guides', COUNT(*) FROM integration_guides
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Glossary Terms', COUNT(*) FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Teachers with longSummary', COUNT(*) FROM teachers WHERE longSummary IS NOT NULL;
